languages.text: {n}Придирчиво оценив выправку офицеров и состояние их формы, Абеляр удовлетворенно кивает.{/n} "Муштра хорошая, послужной список достойный. Посмотрим, как они проявят себя на деле".

{n}After carefully assessing the officers' bearing and their uniforms, Abelard nods with satisfaction.{/n} "Their drilling is good, their service records are excellent. Let's see how they perform in the field."
languages.original_text: {n}Придирчиво оценив выправку офицеров и состояние их формы, Абеляр удовлетворенно кивает.{/n} "Муштра хорошая, послужной список достойный. Посмотрим, как они проявят себя на деле".

traits.locale_text: {n}After carefully assessing the officers' bearing and their uniforms, Abelard nods with satisfaction.{/n} "Their drilling is good, their service records are excellent. Let's see how they perform in the field."

{n}After carefully assessing the officers' bearing and their uniforms, Abelard nods with satisfaction.{/n} "Their drilling is good, their service records are excellent. Let's see how they perform in the field."

languages.text: {n}Tras examinar con atención el porte y los uniformes de los oficiales, Abelard asiente, satisfecho.{/n} «Han tenido una correcta instrucción y sus registros de servicio son excelentes. Veamos qué tal se desenvuelven en situaciones reales».
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully assessing the officers' bearing and their uniforms, Abelard nods with satisfaction.{/n} "Their drilling is good, their service records are excellent. Let's see how they perform in the field."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras examinar con atención el porte y los uniformes de los oficiales, Abelard asiente, satisfecho.{/n} «Han tenido una correcta instrucción y sus registros de servicio son excelentes. Veamos qué tal se desenvuelven en situaciones reales».

languages.text: {n}士官たちの立ち居振る舞いと制服を注意深く見定め、アベラルドは満足げにうなずいた。{/n}「掘削もサービス記録も素晴らしいです。彼らが現場でどのような仕事をするのか、見ものですね」
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully assessing the officers' bearing and their uniforms, Abelard nods with satisfaction.{/n} "Their drilling is good, their service records are excellent. Let's see how they perform in the field."

traits.locale_text: {n}士官たちの立ち居振る舞いと制服を注意深く見定め、アベラルドは満足げにうなずいた。{/n}「掘削もサービス記録も素晴らしいです。彼らが現場でどのような仕事をするのか、見ものですね」

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德仔细观察着在场军官的仪态与制服，随后满意地点了点头。{/n}“他们的训练非常出色，服役记录也很出色。让我们看看他们实际工作的表现吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully assessing the officers' bearing and their uniforms, Abelard nods with satisfaction.{/n} "Their drilling is good, their service records are excellent. Let's see how they perform in the field."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德仔细观察着在场军官的仪态与制服，随后满意地点了点头。{/n}“他们的训练非常出色，服役记录也很出色。让我们看看他们实际工作的表现吧。”

languages.text: {n}Nachdem er die Haltung und Uniformen der Offiziere sorgsam geprüft hat, nickt Abelard zufrieden.{/n} "Ihre Ausbildung ist gut, ihre Dienstbilanz ausgezeichnet. Mal sehen, wie sie sich im Einsatz bewähren."
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully assessing the officers' bearing and their uniforms, Abelard nods with satisfaction.{/n} "Their drilling is good, their service records are excellent. Let's see how they perform in the field."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nachdem er die Haltung und Uniformen der Offiziere sorgsam geprüft hat, nickt Abelard zufrieden.{/n} "Ihre Ausbildung ist gut, ihre Dienstbilanz ausgezeichnet. Mal sehen, wie sie sich im Einsatz bewähren."

languages.text: {n}Après avoir soigneusement évalué le maintien des officiers et leurs uniformes, Abélard hoche la tête, l'air satisfait.{/n} « Ils ont bien manœuvré, et leurs états de service sont excellents. Voyons comment ils s'en sortent sur le terrain. »
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully assessing the officers' bearing and their uniforms, Abelard nods with satisfaction.{/n} "Their drilling is good, their service records are excellent. Let's see how they perform in the field."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après avoir soigneusement évalué le maintien des officiers et leurs uniformes, Abélard hoche la tête, l'air satisfait.{/n} « Ils ont bien manœuvré, et leurs états de service sont excellents. Voyons comment ils s'en sortent sur le terrain. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard, subayların tavırları ile üniformalarını dikkatle incelemesinin ardından memnuniyetle başını eğiyor.{/n} "Tatbikat yetileri iyi durumda, hizmet kayıtları ise muhteşem. Bakalım sahada nasıl bir iş çıkaracaklar."
languages.original_text: {n}After carefully assessing the officers' bearing and their uniforms, Abelard nods with satisfaction.{/n} "Their drilling is good, their service records are excellent. Let's see how they perform in the field."
